post:
[<strong>...</strong>](http://ellipsisno.de/di/) hosts unmanaged dedicated servers via <a href="https://www.datashack.net/network/"><strong>Oak Tower</strong></a> in Kansas City. Servers come with 20TB or 100Mbps unmetered bandwidth, 5 usable IPv4 addresses and a /64 IPv6 block by default.

<pre><a href="http://ellipsisno.de/di/"><strong>Intel Core i7 2600K</strong></a>  
3.4GHz / 3.8GHz Turbo  
4 Cores / 8 Threads  
8GB DDR3 RAM  
250GB SATA HDD  
20TB @ 1Gbps or 100Mbps Unmetered  
/29 IPv4 (5 usable)  
/64 IPv6  
$44 / month

<strong>Temporarily out of stock</strong>
AMD FX-41XX / 43XX  
Intel Core I3 3220
</pre>

<strong>tl;dr</strong> 10% off DataShack. Deployed within two business days from the time your payment is received. PayPal, Bitpay or credit card.

<strong>Do you work for DataShack?</strong> No, I get a 20% discount and resell with their consent. You save 10%, I make 10%.

<strong>/29 max?</strong> Up to one /27 at a time. More become available once your current IPs are 90% utilized. DS requires justification for additional IPv4 so add that to the 'Notes' field if you want more than a /29 off the bat.

<strong>3rd party IPs?</strong> $120 to announce 'em.

<strong>Why Ellipsis Node?</strong> In business for ~2 years and no negative reviews. Why not?  

<strong>Further inquiries?</strong> PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. More servers are available via http://ellipsisno.de/di/.
